name: Okurimono - The Gift
description:
A young Samurai receives an ominous letter. The letter beckons him to the unknown but at what cost? 

A small game I made a few years ago. Hope you enjoy it. 

Controls

W - Throw Shuriken

A - Move Left

S - Sword Attack (Press multiple times for combo attack )

D - Move Right

E - Talk (Press when in range of NPC )

Space Bar - Roll
